frontmatter.intro: Mason graduated from the University of Southern California with a Bachelors in Accounting. He then spent the next three years at KPMG helping large financial institutions (e.g., JP Morgan, UBS, and Capital Group) with performance improvement and financial reporting.

With nearly 20 years of heavy domain experience in telecommunications spanning wireless, VoIP, and cloud communications technologies (accompanied by multiple patents), Aaron brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise, particularly to SaaS.

Mason graduated from the University of Southern California with a Bachelors in Accounting. He then spent the next three years at KPMG helping large financial institutions (e.g., JP Morgan, UBS, and Capital Group) with performance improvement and financial reporting.
In 2013, Yury graduated from the Faculty of Mathematics, Mechanics and Computer Science at the Ural Federal University, one of the most reputable universities in Russia.
